name: DO YOU TRUST ME
description:
Hello. I realeased the game for benbonks game jam. It was really hard, but I did it. I had only 3 days to do this so I don't made even menu. I hope you will enjoy playing :)

MUSIC:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G-FGiICah8Q
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PFbYfgStDQc&t=6s

CONTROLS:
AD - movement.
Space - jump.
RMB - hook.
LMB - katana slash.
